visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course explores how Business Intelligence (BI) is an important new tool for modern business.
objectives_summary: Recognize what business intelligence (BI) is.
Explore how business intelligence works on a theoretical basis.
Identify what steps firms need to take to implement business intelligence.

items.title: Inventory Management: Types, Functions, Nature and Auditing

visible_instructors.name: Venkadesh
visible_instructors.title: Venkadesh Narayanan
visible_instructors.job_title: Principal Consultant at Fhyzics Business Consultants P. Ltd.

items.headline: The participants will learn the types of inventory, its functions, demand nature and inventory auditing methods.
objectives_summary: Inventory Types - Raw Materials, Work-In-Process, Finished Goods, Distribution Inventory and MRO.
Inventory Functions - Safety Stock, Cycle Stock, Anticipation Inventory and Hedge Inventory.
Inventory Nature - Independent Demand and Dependent Demand.

visible_instructors.name: Helpful And Fast
visible_instructors.title: Helpful And Fast Media
visible_instructors.job_title: Invest in yourself and get more out of life.

items.headline: Learn Lean Six Sigma Today! Complete Training for Six Sigma White Belt Certification
objectives_summary: Become A Certified Six Sigma White Belt (You Will Receive A Certificate Upon Completion)
See How An Actual Six Sigma Project Works From Beginning To End
Gain A Complete Understanding Of Six Sigma’s DMAIC Structure

items.title: Certified Quality Management and Quality Assurance Training

visible_instructors.name: Gunjan
visible_instructors.title: Gunjan Subedi
visible_instructors.job_title: Lean Six Sigma and Quality Assurance Specialist

items.headline: Beginner's Certification course on Quality Management and Quality Assurance also helpful for kaizen lean six sigma belts
objectives_summary: We will learn the quality management principles, quality standards and study how we can actually use them in our professional life..
We will learn some lean tools and learn how they can be used for Quality Management with Simulated Case Studies and Quizzes

We will study the History of Quality and know exactly how the concepts of PDCA, Control Charts, Costs of Quality, Statistical Quality Control etc developed and learn to use them practically with excel or minitab.

- Analyze data to identify trends and opportunities

items.title: Measuring and Improving Supply Chain Performance
items.headline: Learn to Effectively Measure, Analyze, Optimize Performance and Improve All Supply Chain Operations
objectives_summary: You will better understand supply chain metrics while attaining a greater ability to improve the supply chain’s overall performance and operations
You will learn how dashboards and scorecards help to keep people better focused in obtaining organization and business objectives
You will have the ability to calculate and elaborate on the various metrics and models needed to better improve supply chain performance
